name: Quantum Rescue
description:
In this puzzle/adventure video game, Ada wants to rescue her pet Bell and to achieve that, Ada must learn to solve quantum circuit puzzles, by finding the necessary quantum gates while exploring the paths that will lead her to the villain Alby's mansion.

Credits

  • Claudia Zendejas-Morales (programming, narrative, producer
  • aronorthgames (art, https://www.fiverr.com/faronorthgames). 
  • Atte Häkkinen (music)

SPOILER ALERT!
Solutions to puzzles here.
